title: Trump’s budget bill benefits private immigration detention companies that donated to Trump
summary: Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill allocated $45 billion for ICE detention facilities, portions of which have been awarded to CoreCivic and GEO Group–that both donated to Trump’s campaign
